cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion for each different element of 'Dagger' Equipment on your Field or in your Gave.
[ACTIVATED] Discard a Spell then your opponent may Discard a Spell with the same name. If they do they Draw 3 cards Else you Draw 3 cards.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion then Activate a Spell.
[ACTIVATED] Equip up to 3 Equipment from your Hand to Champions you control.
